data.text:
Several days after the Selection Race. There was a question that 
had been on my mind the whole time. ……maybe that's why I found 
myself heading to that river bank again.

I saw Yaeno Muteki here the day before the race, but the Yaeno 
Muteki I saw the day of the race――
……！ You are――
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
……in the spectator seats at the Selection Race, I saw that you 
happened to be there. While it's a bit late, thank you for taking 
the trouble to attend.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
However…… even though you took the trouble to come see me, 
I showed you such a disappointing run…… I am ashamed……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: ……you were completely different during the race
choices.processed: <size=33>……you were completely different during the race</size>

choices.text: ……you were completely different during the race
choices.processed: <size=33>……you were completely different during the race</size>

data.text: …………you have a very discerning eye, it seems.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
If I had to answer that question, then the real me―― 
was most likely the one you saw during the race.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
Unable to control that 『Ardent Flame』 within myself, letting it 
rage while running…… that immaturity, is my foundation.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
Shut up, shut up！ Because…… because it pisses me off！！ 
It makes me sick！！ Just like that, my vision turns red……！！
data.name: Young Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
……when I was young, I often behaved violently, letting my 
emotions and desires run wild like a beast. Solving everything I 
didn't like using power, like some kind of brigand.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
Without knowing what I should do, being controlled by my inner 
furor, injuring those around me, ignoring others……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
It's fine, I'll just beat everyone！！ All those weaklings, 
beating all of them, and then…… alone by myself……
data.name: Young Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
『Weaklings』 is it? Hmmm. 
……if that is the case, then as long as I am here, you shall never be alone.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather

data.text: Ah…… G-…… Grandpa……
data.name: Young Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
Come along, it's long past time you came to the dojo, Yaeno. 
……it's time to train with Grandpa.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather

data.text:
For that exceedingly immature me, the one who persistently 
imparted upon me―― was the head of the 『Kongou 
Yaegaki Ryuu』, my grandfather.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
My grandfather said this. That inner fury―― if you continue to 
allow this 『Ardent Flame』 to rage, you will naturally continue to 
suffer the consequences.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
Channel this in to the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu 『Kata』, in order to 
temper that wild tendency. By doing this, you may eventually 
reach the state of 『Tranquil Water』.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: And were you able to calm down？
And were you able to calm down？

data.text:
Yes. Due to the days of training with my exemplary grandfather, 
even if just a little, I've learned to keep myself in check, and 
obtained some measure of harmony.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
However, even this 『Tranquil Water』, 
was unable to quell the 『Ardent Flame』 within me……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
Perhaps fearing I would once again fall in to madness and injure 
another, one day, my grandfather inquired of me―
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
On that path, without bringing harm to others, rather reveling 
jointly in contention. On that path, this fury becomes a ray of 
light. ――What would that path be？
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather

data.text:
……I shall ask this of you as well. The answer to my grandfather's 
question, would you happen to know？
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
……there was one thing that came to mind. Something where the goal 
is not to injure, but to compete and enjoy oneself. That's――
――As I thought, you're quite discerning.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
Coming to know of races, granted me some measure of contentment 
as I had found my path.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
Using martial arts to temper this fury, harnessing this fury 
during races. These violent emotions within me now had an outlet, 
they could be channeled――
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
And thus…… I realized. On this path, if I could obtain splendid 
results, I could take pride in myself…… and properly repay him.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
Even if I'm immature…… even though I've done nothing but cause my 
grandfather trouble, and worry. That I could still show him that 
I can hold my chest out in pride……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text: However……――！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
Even on this path！ Even in the race, I've been made aware that I 
can still be overcome by these emotions……！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
I need to be straightened out！ These overflowing emotions, 
continue to disturb the immature 『Ardent Flame』 within me！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
If I… can't handle at least that much…… if I continue 
staying this immature, no matter how long passes…… 
I won't be able to repay him……！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
I need to continue training…… 
My training, was insufficient……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
Being unable to control herself, while carrying 
that anguish―― Even with that, Yaeno Muteki was 
earnestly trying to overcome this hurdle.

While standing there in front of her, 
these words naturally came out―

choices.text: Will you let me help you？
Will you let me help you？

data.text: Eh――
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
…………for what reason？ From the perspective of a trainer, 
my current self is nothing but an illーtempered Uma Musume, there is 
no merit in being concerned with me.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: Merit has nothing to do with this

data.text:
To show her that that was not the reason―― 
I continued to look straight in to her eyes.

choices.text: I want to cheer you on
I want to cheer you on

data.text:
…………you're quite sincere, aren't you? Your words, 
and those eyes…… so straight-forward, as if 
you believe you can't be mistaken.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
……truthfully, I'm fully aware that I'm at a complete loss. 
That's why…… I would also like to request your help.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
In order to help me find a way to control this 『Ardent Flame』…… 
would I be able to request your assistance?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text: ……you have my gratitude.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

data.text:
Yaeno Muteki has a large hurdle in front of 
her. A way to overcome it…… from now on, together 
with her, we'd try to find a way!
